title: Use ION for fetching solar conditions.
Fix user crashes on solar screen.
Ability to input phonetic alphabet in to callsign lookup.
Better handling of cases where GPS or Network location disabled
Fix of NPE and QRZ.com link interception
body:
Hi,

I have fixed an issue where Ham crashed when started with all sources of location disabled (both GPS and Network location).

In addition, I have added an intent filter to automatically open the QRZ activity when a QRZ.com/db link is opened (e.g. from my APRSdroid app ;-) )

title: Clickable grid launches google maps and geo always shows up on main screen.
use latest stable maven android plugin
